snippet: Drew Peterson, the former suburban Chicago police officer who generated a media storm after his fourth wife vanished in 2007, was convicted Thursday of murdering his third wife.
abstract: Drew Peterson, the former suburban Chicago police officer who generated a media storm after his fourth wife vanished in 2007, is convicted of murdering his third wife, Kathleen Savio.
lead_paragraph: Drew Peterson, the former suburban Chicago police officer who generated a media storm after his fourth wife vanished in 2007, was convicted Thursday of murdering his third wife.
